name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a skillet, cook the pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk the eggs and Parmesan.
Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture. Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A fresh Caesar salad with grilled chicken, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Chop the lettuce and place it in a bowl.
Add grilled chicken slices and croutons.
Drizzle Caesar dressing, top with Parmesan, and serve.

name: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: A Margherita pizza with fresh basil, mozzarella, and tomato sauce.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 220°C (430°F).
Spread tomato sauce on the dough.
Top with mozzarella and basil.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A quick, healthy vegetable stir fry with a soy-ginger sauce.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan over medium-high.
Add ginger and stir-fry vegetables until tender.
Pour soy sauce and toss. Serve with rice or noodles.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies.
instructions: Preheat oven to 175°C (350°F).
Cream butter and sugars, then add eggs and vanilla.
Gradually add flour, baking soda, and salt.
Stir in chocolate chips, drop onto baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Traditional beef tacos with fresh toppings.
instructions: Cook beef, onion, and garlic in a skillet until browned.
Season with chili powder, salt, and pepper.
Spoon into taco shells, add lettuce, salsa, and cheese.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread to your liking.
Mash avocado and season with salt and pepper.
Spread avocado on toast, drizzle with olive oil, and add pepper flakes.

name: Lemon Garlic Salmon
description: Juicy salmon with a lemon-garlic butter sauce.
instructions: Season salmon with salt and pepper.
Melt butter in a skillet, add garlic and lemon slices.
Place salmon in the skillet and cook until done.
Garnish with parsley and serve.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy risotto with mushrooms and Parmesan cheese.
instructions: Heat oil in a pot and cook onion until soft.
Add mushrooms and cook until tender.
Stir in rice and gradually add broth until absorbed.
Add Parmesan, season with salt and pepper, and serve.

name: Caprese Salad
description: A fresh salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Layer tomato, mozzarella, and basil on a plate.
Drizzle with olive oil, season with salt and pepper.
Add balsamic glaze if desired.

name: Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes served with syrup and fresh berries.
ingredients: Fresh berries and maple syrup for serving
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk buttermilk, egg, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
Heat a pan over medium heat and add butter.
Pour batter onto the pan, cooking until bubbles form, then flip.
Serve with fresh berries and syrup.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Bell peppers filled with a savory mixture of rice, beans, and cheese.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cut the tops off the peppers and remove seeds.
In a bowl, mix rice, beans, corn, tomatoes, cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper.
Stuff the mixture into the peppers and place them in a baking dish.
Top with shredded cheese and cover with foil.
Bake for 25 minutes, then uncover and bake for an additional 10 minutes.

name: Shrimp Tacos
description: Delicious shrimp tacos topped with fresh cilantro and lime.
instructions: In a bowl, toss shrimp with olive oil, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and cook shrimp until pink and cooked through.
Warm tortillas in a pan or microwave.
Assemble tacos with shrimp, cabbage, and cilantro.
Serve with lime wedges.

name: Egg Fried Rice
description: Quick and easy egg fried rice with vegetables.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add beaten eggs and scramble until cooked. Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, add mixed vegetables and cook until tender.
Add cooked rice, soy sauce, and scrambled eggs. Stir well.
Season with salt and pepper, and stir in green onions before serving.

name: Berry Smoothie
description: A refreshing berry smoothie packed with nutrients.
ingredients: 1/2 cup almond milk (or milk of choice)
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Blend until smooth, adding more milk for desired consistency.
Serve immediately, garnished with fresh berries if desired.
